website_summaries.verdict: Although marketed specifically for bearded dragons, other reptiles and birds may enjoy this mix.
pros: Reduces the need to keep live prey on hand
Contains organic mealworms, grasshoppers, and crickets, no fruit or fillers
Appealing to insect-eating birds as well
cons: Some bearded dragons prefer live prey only
May not be suitable for omnivores

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. The crickets and grasshoppers are big, full bodies, and not broken. There is a great mix of everything! My Benji immediately ran to his bowl and I could tell that he really liked this! I will definitely purchase from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great source of protein
customer_reviews.text: My bearded dragon loves this food. While it did have more mealworms than cricket and grass hoppers it brings a good amount of these too. I'm happy with it. I'm feeding this to my dragon along with a salad that varies between kale, collar greens, carrots, squash, bok choi, and occasionally apples or strawberries. I'm also feeding him live crickets whenever I can find them on my pet store. (I ordered some online too). So far my dragon seems happy and healthy. I do not recommend feeding these alone as the dry food could constipate the dragon, so make sure you feed some fresh greens too and that the drago stays hydrated. All in all, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing. You HAVE to try these snacks.
customer_reviews.text: These things were amazing, a friend suggested I try them and I was skeptical. But after weeks of persuasion and to be frank, downright begging me to try them I relented. I can't believe I'm saying this but they were one of the most flavorful delicious snacks I've ever had. I just can't stop eating these things. Trust me if you are on the fence about buying these things do yourself a favor and go ahead and grab a jar. You'll thank me later
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, the dragons love it. No need to deal with live insects, just soak in hot water to re-hydrate. My dragons gobble it up, wish I had known about this before. When I previously fed them live crickets, some times they (crickets) would escape and hop around my house, or hide under things in the aquarium. I really didn't like that! Now I can see and know that the insects have been consumed.
customer_reviews.author: jajh54

customer_reviews.title: I know these are sold for bearded dragons but I ...
customer_reviews.text: I know these are sold for bearded dragons but I actually bought it for my leopard geckos. Both my geckos are trained to eat off of tongs. I soak these in water for awhile before feeding them. I was surprised but both my geckos readily ate these. I normally feed them live bugs but keep a jar of these around for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: MDTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I use Flukers products for years, I just opened ...
customer_reviews.text: I use Flukers products for years,I just opened this jar, and there is a Dead FROG in it! Not sure what to do now
customer_reviews.author: Razma Rok

customer_reviews.title: Dragon Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised my Dragon liked these! I got them as an emergency because my shipment of bugs is late and my pet store was out of crickets. It came same day and was hoping he would eat them. I put them in a bowl and it took him about 10 minutes of staring at them and he ate the whole bowl! He didn’t mind them at all :)
customer_reviews.author: Christina Eno

customer_reviews.title: Beardie says Yummy
customer_reviews.text: My Bearded Dragon loves these crunchy bites! I feed them as hand treats and sometimes sprinkle some on his salad. He loves them. No hesitation so I’d say they smell good to him. I will say the container was open and emptied into the shipping box, not good. I was able to recover 98% of the product so decided not to complain.
customer_reviews.author: Sandpile

customer_reviews.title: A good substitute for live when necessary
customer_reviews.text: These are great for when I go on vacation and have friends keep an eye on my dragon. He doesn't like them nearly as much as live critters, but my friends cant handle the live bugs. I feel they are nutritionally good for him as long as we use fresh veggies and fruit for him too.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great medley
customer_reviews.text: Our beardy loves this medley. We tend to use this when we are out of town and don’t have the ability to give him live crickets or fresh veggies. He loves it. His bowl is always empty when we come home. We do coat the medley with his vitamin powder and it doesn’t bother him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product presents nicely
customer_reviews.text: The product presents well in the dish, but my beardie mostly prefers greens now. He tends to pick out the grasshoppers and leave the smaller insects. My water dragon will consume all the bugs, but also consumes the larger bugs first. Changing to a straight grasshopper mix.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Handrahan

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: My dragon won't eat them. Mixed some live works with it to try to trick him, and when he accidentally got a dried piece, he flung it out lol. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Nice assortment of bugs
customer_reviews.text: My lizards didnt like it but our frogs did. Nice assortment and different sizes. As far as smell...they are dead bugs and smelled putrid which was as I expected. I just wished the lizards would touch it but they wouldnt
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Trussell

customer_reviews.title: Great Treats!
customer_reviews.text: My bearded dragon loves these! This pack is cheaper than the bigger container, so I will be buying the smaller container from now on. It is also much cheaper than the one at Petco, a $5 + difference, so that's good.
customer_reviews.author: Joy W

customer_reviews.title: Dragon loves these
customer_reviews.text: The dragon loves these. I’m lazy and don’t get to the store for live feed often so I am hoping these are a good replacement for the live crickets! It also is a good topper for his greens, almost like croutons lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bearded dragons love them
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 bearded dragons and they love these. They especially enjoy the millworms. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nice Treat or Backup Food Supply
customer_reviews.text: My bearded enjoys these. We offer them whenever there are no bugs handy. They are a nice pantry staple if you have a bearded dragon and mines doesn’t seem to have any issue with them. These are usually offered as treats and fed by hand to help bond with our beardie.
customer_reviews.author: Princess B

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: My tortoise loves these! He seems very healthy and gobbles up all of his insects with his veggies. In my experience this is a great product, and definitely less expensive on Amazon than in the pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith J

customer_reviews.title: My pet loves this
customer_reviews.text: My dragon tears these up I do mix it with calcium worms and things I tried putting these on top of lettuce and kale to try to get her to eat more healthy foods but she won't eat the lettuce or kale.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth swarthout

customer_reviews.title: Container is small and bugs are pretty hollow
customer_reviews.text: The container is pretty small and the bugs are all very dry and falling apart. I still feed them over his greens just to not have wasted my money but I probably won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute if you don't have live prey!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up not needing these and returning them, but I have used them before and they are great. As long as your pet will eat not life pray it's a good substitute, when you don't have live prey to feed them.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Beardie loves it but bad for him
customer_reviews.text: My bearded dragon loves these but unfortunately, it gives my beardy diarrhea. ): really not else to write. It smells like dried...something. Sorta unpleasant. The worms are very small & the grasshoppers (I think) are freakin huge! Overall I wish this didn't make my beardy sick otherwise I would keep feeding this to him.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Backup food
customer_reviews.text: Beardies prefer live worms but these are great during bad weather when the live worms don’t ship. Great quality and good idea to have a back up food source.
customer_reviews.author: Nee Love

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Our dragon just loves this stuff. Amazon has the best price that I've seen so far. Good quality. Seems a little lacking in the bigger insects but it is for treat use and it is a treat when they get a grasshopper.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Gomez

customer_reviews.title: The only thing my box turtle want to eat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased many other types of food and none of them let my box turtle to eat, except for this one. My box turtle loves to eat these crickets!
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Lizard salad croutons
customer_reviews.text: These make a nice little crunchy topper for my adult beardies salad hopefully with out the risk of parasites. The price on all of flukers products are so great. I just search flukers for most of my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: King Louis approved!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase as crickets are expensive to buy every few days. My beardie has actually enjoyed the mix of these with the live ones!
customer_reviews.author: Kelcie

customer_reviews.title: My Dragons said no~
customer_reviews.text: Of course Dragons don't eat dead food, I thought this might be different, but no way~ I did put it out on a flat stone and some animal ate it, but not my Dragons~
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tried Freeze dried and loved them...this time around
customer_reviews.text: I had tried freeze dried food for my beardie before and he would not eat them. This time I added a few live supers in with the freeze dried ones and he ate them all. I like having this option to add something different to his diet.
customer_reviews.author: Lollie

customer_reviews.title: Alright as treats
customer_reviews.text: Our bearded dragon didn't care much for this. He eats it when he has no other alternative. I don't think there's anything wrong with the product. It was just not very enticing for our little dragon.
customer_reviews.author: Gaeia

customer_reviews.title: THESE WORK FOR A DRY WORM/BUG ALTERNATIVE in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: These work for a dry worm/bug alternative to live food if you're in a pinch. Good to use when you run out of live worms.
customer_reviews.author: TayBay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product that my dragon loves!
customer_reviews.text: When my local live cricket suppliers ran out of crickets during hurricane preparations, I panicked. That's when I discovered these dried crickets. I was so afraid my lizard wouldn't eat it. But I sprinkles it on some greens he loves, and he chowed down. What a relief to know I can keep a ready supply of food on hand, and it's something my pet sitter will not freak out over (some people cannot stand handling insects). Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cajuntami

customer_reviews.title: My lizard didn't like this. Don't know why.
customer_reviews.text: My little darling lizard didn't like this bug medley. I don't know why. He wouldn't touch any if it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyous Lady

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my flying squirrels, and they love it. Always wish the quantity was a little more, but, this price much better than retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: EASTERN SHORE CAT

customer_reviews.title: Dragon wouldn’t eat it.
customer_reviews.text: My Bearded Dragon would have nothing to do with the dried insects. I guess he only likes live insects.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Get 3 of these for one at the pet store.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat the price. Do not purchase from your local pet store, unless you like to overpay?
customer_reviews.author: Blake G

customer_reviews.title: looks good, lots of whole 1 piece insects
customer_reviews.text: some of anoles wont eat this, but i guess its their fault. maybe not moving things are less attractive.
customer_reviews.author: yizhou

customer_reviews.title: Wet them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my fence lizard and he likes them. Took some advice from another review and wet them. After a week or two he came around. I use these only when I don't have access to fresh ones though and they seem to last long.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Axels favorite
customer_reviews.text: These are by far my bearded dragon s favorite non live snack. Good price fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great for juveniles
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t smell at all, beardie will eat these up faster then you put it down when I ran out of food I’d use this as a substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Mattie

customer_reviews.title: Not for turtles
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping my turtles would like it, but they won’t touch it. It really is for dragons.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my pet.
customer_reviews.text: My bearded dragon loves this but my first automatic delivery, the bottle was empty and the contents was just laying everywhere in the sack.
customer_reviews.author: Shirleyanne

customer_reviews.title: Bearded dragon loves!
customer_reviews.text: Our bearded dragon clearly prefers these treats over anything else. He picks out the meal worms first, then eats the rest. Even giving him 2-3 times per week, this jar has lasted almost 3 months. Will be buying again soon.
customer_reviews.author: roxbook.girl

customer_reviews.title: Opened Container
customer_reviews.text: The container came opened in the bottom of the envelope. Was not a huge deal other then opening and being hit in the face with the smell of wasted bugs. Was easily dumped into container and lid was secured tightly. Lizard loves them and first brand able to please a picky dragon.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette ELLIOTT

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great mix of nutritious bugs at an awesome price!! I just put calcium powder right in the jar with the bugs and Hendrix is happy and healthy :)
customer_reviews.author: caitlin r.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Worth the value. Wished it had a more even ratio. Good to use as added protein for dragons diet
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Delivery of product
customer_reviews.text: When I received the package in the mail I was very disappointed. Upon opening the package I found the entire Contents had spilled out of the container. It was incredibly messy. The container should have been sealed or mailed in different packaging. The price was great just not worth all the cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Florida girl

customer_reviews.title: Great  for a Hedgie
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog does not like the mealworms but he seems to like the crickets :)
customer_reviews.author: Brian R. Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Good for some!
customer_reviews.text: My bearded dragon eats them while my leopard geckos don't. I'll try more times and update my review again. Btw, I like the price and the quality though. thanks
customer_reviews.author: L&R

customer_reviews.title: Bearded dragon
customer_reviews.text: My son's bearded dragon seems to like it and we haven't noticed any strange health effects
customer_reviews.author: Waldo

customer_reviews.title: My Beardie loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know about the nutritional value, since these insects are freezed-dried. But, soon as our girl sees me walk over with the container, she’s standing at the ready! Makes for a good little treat.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Waggett

customer_reviews.title: My bearded dragon didn't like these at all
customer_reviews.text: My bearded dragon didn't like these at all. He loves the Fluker's Crickets, but there is nothing in this mix he was willing to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Atwood

customer_reviews.title: The lizard will not eat dead worms etc, so ...
customer_reviews.text: The lizard will not eat dead worms etc, so I put meal worms in the bowl with the Medley and everything starts moving. So the lizard eats mouthfuls and this saves me money on live worms.
customer_reviews.author: Get Rich

customer_reviews.title: My lizard is picky
customer_reviews.text: My bearded dragon picky because they are not alive. She does not eat them.
customer_reviews.author: LILIANA

customer_reviews.title: Great snack for bearded dragon.
customer_reviews.text: Our beardie goes to these when he needs a snack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: My bearded dragon loves these and races to the food bowl when I put them as a topping on her food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Treats
customer_reviews.text: Mixed Nutrition for my sons Bearded Dragon Zuri!! Great Price
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ferrara

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy for my busy schedule
customer_reviews.text: As usual, fluker's has a decent product. Quick and easy for my busy schedule, when getting to the pet store for live food just doesn't work. Who has time to go to the pet store 3 time a week? Or wants to deal with keeping stinky bugs in your house? By dragons prefer gut loaded roaches, but they'll gobble these us before I get home from work too.
customer_reviews.author: gothbear

customer_reviews.title: My Bearded Dragon Says Its VERY YUMMY
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved this and as soon as I put it in my dragon's dish she jumped off her rock and ran to it.. gobbled it up and asked for more. She is unique in that she will readily try any new foods I offer but she LOVED this.. makes me happy she loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn

customer_reviews.title: My dragons love this I add it to there foods as a ...
customer_reviews.text: My dragons love this I add it to there foods as a little snack for them easy ordering and delivery as well will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great treats for your Bearded Dragons
customer_reviews.text: Another great treat for Bearded Dragons. Ours get excited to see the jar coming. It's filled with tons of protein that a growing lizard​ needs. I would recommend this only as a treat. The product is dried out, which is to be expected so your lizards will get no hydration from these which is why I see use them as a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The container was beat up however it was still in ok condition
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Younger

customer_reviews.title: Great source of food for Bearded Dragons
customer_reviews.text: My Bearded Dragon loves this, i like that he gets more of a variety!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog was really into this treat! The giant dried up grasshoppers are creepy AF.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: My beardie loved this food. It's also a good price only reason I didnt give everything 5stars is because the majority of the food is just the worms not and even mix and item didnt have any type of seal when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Bonadio

customer_reviews.title: Soooooooo happy!
customer_reviews.text: My turtles love this food, they recognize the jar when I pull it out of the cabinet. Will be purchasing again, just wish it was sold in a larger container.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Lots crickets for bearded dragon
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, my bearded dragon hasn't had this one in particular but it has lots on crickets and he loves crickets. so we will see, came on time and in a envelope. So far I'll say I will buy again and if he loves it I'll subscribe
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend. My Beardies loves
customer_reviews.text: Received promptly. Just as expected. Would recommend. My Beardies loves them
customer_reviews.author: Rob Greene

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our Bearded dragon didn't like these much but it was worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Saldana

customer_reviews.title: Best Snack
customer_reviews.text: My lizards adore these little munchies. As soon as I place them in the cage she dives for them.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Got these for hermit crabs and they seem to like them
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Buenrostro

customer_reviews.title: BD loves!
customer_reviews.text: My bd loves these! I always get these for him
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy warning bring ants in ur reptiles cage
customer_reviews.text: Very bad don’t buy this food attracts ants very bad never had problem till I bought this food
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Nice 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Bearded dragon enjoys them! I got an even amount of insects in the batch that I got. Flukers seems to be a brand I'll keep buying from in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Avila

customer_reviews.title: My beardy doesn't like them much
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping he'd eat them but he only eat them if he is starving.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Fluker Labs Bearded dragon medley
customer_reviews.text: not to happy with this.. my bearded dragon is not a big fan of mealy worms... wish there were more grasshoppers and crickets in the mix... it's mostly mealy worms
customer_reviews.author: Gloria F.

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: Very small jar for the money you pay and it has crickets in it which i didn't know. I thought it was just mealworms.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: For large lizard
customer_reviews.text: Crickets were to big didnt know until they came in
customer_reviews.author: Beth Baker

customer_reviews.title: Bearded Dragon - Likes!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this product. Read the reviews - not enough of this or that. No issues here. Came with plenty of crickets and grass hoppers. Worms i just drop into my dragons bowl. He loves them Very impressed
customer_reviews.author: WV Mountaineer

customer_reviews.title: Bearded Dragon loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My son's bearded dragon loved this medley. We used it whenever the pet stores were out of crickets.

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: My beardy loves this the only reason I have it a four and not a five is it could be a sight but cheaper
customer_reviews.author: B_P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great snack for our bearded dragons and they love it.. Very convenient when we run out of live food.

customer_reviews.title: SMALL JAR, BUT GOOD PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Our bearded dragons love this. I wish it came in a larger size with more crickets.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Beach

customer_reviews.title: No seal intact
customer_reviews.text: The seal was not there when I recieved the package so I dont know if I'm feeding my dragon food that has been tampered with or stale
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Not tasty for mine
customer_reviews.text: Baby bear die did not care for these, tried multiple times
customer_reviews.author: lauren miller

customer_reviews.title: Bearded dragon is loving it.
customer_reviews.text: Beardie loves it!! Eats too much now that he has this stuff lol
customer_reviews.author: El Goretoy

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: My beardie approves! Especially loves the grasshoppers. Nice and fresh - not the dried little pieces you get from some mfgs.
customer_reviews.author: L. Vantresco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dragon didnt really take to them. But they fulfilled their purpose of being dead bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Kirk

customer_reviews.title: beardies love these in a small dish
customer_reviews.text: beardies love these in a small dish. squirt a little water on and salt and pepper them. salt=calcium pepper=powdered veggies+minerals I put these into salt shakers works great
customer_reviews.author: William L. Macy

customer_reviews.title: Balthazar loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My beardie loved this the first time it hit his dish! It is mostly made up of mealworms..there are very few grasshoppers in it...but nonetheless Balthazar loved it! Very happy with this and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jdj1981

customer_reviews.title: My beardie loves these. We bought them for people ...
customer_reviews.text: My beardie loves these. We bought them for people to feed him while we were on vacation. We will keep them around for times when we run out of live food for him.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Happy hedgehog
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog loves this mix of treats. I sprinkle them around his cage so he can forage for them.
customer_reviews.author: Tarah

customer_reviews.title: I usually buy this from petco. It's a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this from petco. It's a little cheaper here and you get free shipping so it's a win win. I use this for my bearded dragon and he loves it. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hermies love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's an excellent product for hermit crabs. What more can I say?

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great mixture of insect's, my beardie loved them all... This product is great and I will definitely be ordering again!

customer_reviews.title: Good mix, beardies love them
customer_reviews.text: My bearded dragons love this mix when I don't have live crickets or when someone else has to care for them for me. Easy, not stinky.

customer_reviews.title: Our bearded dragon likes them
customer_reviews.text: He eats these even after he's been used to live food.

customer_reviews.title: Makes lizards go yum!!
customer_reviews.text: My bearded dragon couldn't get enough of these!! He loves them!! Great product!

customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised and a super full jar. My beardie loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Bearded Dragons
customer_reviews.text: My dragons loves this stuff so we order all the time.

product_meta.title: Fluker's Medley Treat for Bearded Dragons
product_meta.description: Size:1.8-OunceA perfect blend of freeze-dried mealworms, grasshoppers, and crickets ensures that your Dragon will accept this treat, all without the hassle of dealing with live prey items.
feature_bullets: All without the hassle of dealing with live Prey items
Provides essential proteins, fats, vitamins and minerals
